be fatal to the well being of an individual. This fascinating play will be enjoyed by audiences of all ages.
Subtitle: null
Title: Gawulayo! Gawulayo!
Author: N. Tutani

Description: Peter dreamed of becoming a soccer star. But how could he if he didn't even have soccer boots? So Peter made a deal with his father. Would Peter be able to earn his boots?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Laduma!
Author: Nompumelelo Zama and Elton Leeman

Description: Peter se droom is om 'n sokkerster te wees. Maar hoe kan hy dit doen as hy nie eens sokkerstewels het nie? Peter kom ooreen met sy pa. Sal Peter sy stewels kan verdien?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Laduma!
Author: Nompumelelo Zama and Elton Leeman

Description: uPeter wayanebhudango lokuba mdlali omkhulu webholo. Kodwana wayangaliphumelela njani ibhudango lakhe nakanganawo amakhoksi? uPeter wensa isithebiso nobabkhe. Ingabe uPeter uzakwazi ukusebenzela amakhosi wakhe?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Laduma!
Author: Nompumelelo Zama and Elton Leeman

Description: null
Subtitle: null
Title: Ezasekuhlaleni
Author: G.N. Zide

Description: Sekulithuba elinobom kufuneka ukuba ibekho incwadana elolu hlobo, yokufundisa izifihlelo kwintsapho efunda kwizikolo zemini. Umhlobo wethu ke, uMongameli wabaHloli beZikolo, wenze imigungqo ephathekayo - yaba ke namhla yiyo le loo ncwadana esisiqalo. Sicela ucoselelo lweetitshala ekuyifundiseni. Siyawabulela amanene athe avuma ukuba imihobe ayenzileyo kunye nemibongo, ifakwe nayo apha; yona ke yobonakala kunye namagama awo. Sithi abenu enkonzweni.
Subtitle: null
Title: Imihobe Nemibongo
Author: S.E.K. Mqhayi

Description: Luncwadi lwemibongo olo hlulwe lwazi ndidi kukho ezithetha ngempilo, ngendalo, ubomi, nothando. An anthology of isiXhosa poetry that explores different aspects of our lives. These meaningful poems are about life, nature, health and love.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ilitha Lobomi (Creative Writing Series)
Author: L.V Mabinza

Description: Le yincwadi yemihobe esizobela iliso elibukhali lo mbhali kuthando lwakhe kubuhle bezinto zendalo. Ukanti ke usidandalazile nesakhono sakhe esinomahluko kwisimo sakhe sokubhala. Ubugcisa bokuzoba imifanekiso - ngqondweni siyabubona ngokucacileyo apha kule ngqokelela yemihobe nezibongo. A poetry collection that explores the poet's love of nature and beauty. His unique style of writing makes the poems enjoyable to read and will draw the reader in.
Subtitle: null
Title: Iliso Lesihobe (Creative Writing Series)
Author: L.S. Nqcangata

Description: Ikhubalo liyeza lokuphilisa injalo nembongi ukubhala ngenjongo yokunyanga isizwe ngakumbi kwiimpawu zentsulungeko nokuxabisa isizwe kwiimbono ezakhayo. Ixhobisa isizwe ngokubonga ngale mibongo ilandelayo: Imfundo, Igumbi lokufundela, zingisa, encotsheni yentaba, uviwo nezinye. The poet endeavours to heal humanity through his beautiful poems. His poems include the subject matter of education amongst others.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ikhubalo LikaXhosa
Author: M.L. Pambo

Description: Iingxangxasi incwadi yezibongo ebhalwe ngu Thelminah Nobantu Ndlazulwana. Ezizibongo zesiXhosa zihlulwe ngeendidi kanje* Kukho ezithetha nge Bhayibheli* Kukho ezithetha ngothando* Ezithetha ngeento eziqhelekileyo* Kukho ezithetha ngobomi* Kanti kukho nezithetha ngokufa Umongo wezizibongo kukuba ubhalwe ngendlela engaqhelekanga. Lendlela yokubhala izibongo ezifutshane, intsha esiXhoseni. Sinethemba lokuba abafundi bezincwadi zesiXhosa bazakuluvuyela oluhlobo lwencwadi lunqabe kangakanana.
Subtitle: null
Title: Iingxangxasi (Creative Writing Series)
Author: Thelminah Nobantu Ndlazulawana

Description: Ukuthanda kukaThemba Gasela imali kumkhokelela kwingxwabangxwaba embi ukubulala. Umongo walo mdlalo kukuba imali ingangumthombo wolonwabo olukhulu kwanowobubi ngokunjalo, iyayiphucula intlalo yoluntu kodwa ikwangunozala wobundlobongela nezaphuli - mthetho. Themba Gasela's love of money gets him into a bad situation involving murder. The underlying message of this play is that money is the root of all evil.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ingalo (Creative Writing Series)
Author: K.S. Bongela

Description: Kulo mdlalo uyisekazi kaJimmy uba nemincili engathethekiyo xa esamkela unyana womkhululwa wakhe ongesekhoyo owatshiphayo eRhawutini, kanti wamkela irhobosha lerhamba esele libulele kwaloo nyana welo khaya. Oku kuzaliswa ziindaba zokufika komphanga kaNtuntumbo. A gripping drama about Jimmy’s father who finds it difficult to welcome the son of his long deceased brother, into his family.
Subtitle: null
Title: Isikhwakhwa NoBessie
Author: D.T. Mtywaku

Description: Le yincwadi yedrama ebonisa ukuba ngenene isikhuni sibuya nokhwezeli, kuba izinto ezimbi ezenziwa ngumntu zibuya zijike naye. UNovuyisile, utshatile, kodwa ngenxa yokuba angakwazanga kuzibamba usuke athandane. Uthabatheka leli soka ade afumanene ingozi yemoto ehamba nalo. Ufunyanwa ngumyeni wakhe elele ngandletyananye esibhedlele. This exciting drama is about a girl called Novuyisile who decides to go back to school after getting married. ?While training as a nurse, she falls in love with another man, but then lands up in hospital, after having an accident with him.
Subtitle: null
Title: Izinto Zimana Ukwenzeka
Author: Sydney Dumehleli Siphambo

Description: Le yincwadi yedrama ebonisa ngeengxaki namanzithinzithi omhlaba abathi abantu bagaxeleke kuzo. Le ncwadi igxile ukuveza ukuba alukho ulonwabo apha emhlabeni. UmaRhadebe ugxothwa ngudade wabo onxile oludaka endlwini ezinzulwini zobusuku uthi rhuthu imela esifubeni xa engafuni. Ingaba uphelela phi lo mgxothwa? Kwelinye icala intliziyo kaNtobeko iba lihlwili xa ebhaqa inkosikazi yakhe ithandana noyise ozala yena Ntobeko. Athini bethu? Ziphandele ukhangele ukuba isonjululwa njani le ntsumantsumane yesi sithathu? This book brings to light the problems that people come across in life. ?The main aim of this book is to examine the possibility that there is no happiness in the world.
Subtitle: null
Title: Kuphi na Ukuphumla
Author: E.M. Mbobo

Description: Lo ngumdlalo wedrama apho uNesi athe ngenxa yengxubakaxaka yobulawo lwabantu wakhetha ukushiya ukuba ngumongikazi waya kufundela ubupolisa. Ufika ubundlobongela bunyuke ngodonga eRhalisihwe. Ukuphanda kukaNesi ngokubulawa kwale nkosikazi kuveza izinto ezininzi. Ingaba kuvele ntoni? Ziphandele. This gripping drama is about a nurse who cannot cope with the reality of seeing so many deaths. She therefore decides to leave the hospital, and become a policewoman.
Subtitle: null
Title: Liseza Kutshona
Author: E. M. Mbobo

Description: N'wina is manifestation of the challenges faced by parents in bringing-up children in a society besieged by drug and alcohol abuse, permissiveness, and materialism. Contention for control between the parents and the children's influential friends is appalling. Joyce had such an influence and hold on Thandi, so Thandi was determined no to miss her party at all costs - but little did Thandi know that this was a set-up. Joyce knew that Thandi's boyfriend, Joeman, could not attend the party due to his soccer team commitments. This provided City with a perfect opportunity! In the morning, after a night spent in a drunken stupor, Thandi woke up only to find herself in City's bed! This proved to be a costly exercise which unleashed a chain of unpleasant events.\r\n\r\nThis exciting novel by CM Lubisi, an experienced author and winner of numerous awards, teaches the youth that they must face the consequences of their actions.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ndiyazisola (MML Literature Series)
Author: P. Notununu

Description: Ubuxelegu bokungakwazi ukuziphatha bamwisa phantsi ehlazweni uMawonga Loni. UJongilanga usizoba qaqambileyo isiwo somntu okholwa butywala nangabasetyhini. Corruption is the central theme of this moving short drama, where Mawonga Loni’s moral degeneration, and love of women and alcohol, causes his downfall.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ndiyekeni
Author: D.M. Jongilanga

Description: Lo mdlalo ungentombi enguNozibele Luzi eyazalwa yakhulela kwikhaya labantu abahluphekileyo, ababomvu. Xa ekwibanga lesibhozo waba nzima, wakhanyelwa nguSipho waza wayekiswa nguyise esikolweni. Wadibana nomfana onguZolani, wamncedisa ukubuyisela impilo yakhe ekhondweni - wamfunel'umsebenzil wamfundisa bada bagqibela ngokuthandana. This tragic drama is about a girl called Nozibele, born into a poor and illiterate family. In Grade 10 she falls pregnant, by her boyfriend Sipho, yet he denies responsibility. This leads to her having to leave school.
Subtitle: null
Title: Nosel' Eyibethile Akakayoji
Author: N.T. Gwegwe

Description:
UNompelazwe ulukuhla uNothemba aye eGoli. Akamtheli-thsuphe tu ngentlalo
yesi sixeko. Umyeka azibonele. UNothemba uphela ephila ngokuhenyuza.
Isithandwa sabumini angakhange azandlale kuso simlahla eMusina. Umkhondo
kaNothemba walandwa emva kowabo eMpuma Koloni. Unina uNoyephi uyibethisa
ngoyaba into yokokuba intombi le yakhe inokuba sele yasulelwe ngugawulayo.
This drama explores the trials and tribulations of the young after qualifying to start
a career. Nompelazwe travels to the city of Gold – Johannesburg – to fulfi ll her
dreams, only to have them shattered. She is forced into prostitution and eventually
acquires HIV/AIDs.
Subtitle: null
Title: Owu! Yini! Nothemba Mntwana Kamama!
Author: Khumbuzile Maliwa

Description: Lo ngumdlalo obonisa indlela abafundisi abaphathwa ngayo ezinkonzweni xa befika bethathelwa apha phezulu. Iimeko ziyatshintsha ngakumbi kubafundisi abalula ngeminyaka bebetsha apha ebufundisini, apho kulindeleke ukuba intlalo yabo ingabinachaphaza. Umongamelikazi ulindeleke ukuba adlale indima yoba ngumfundisi angabinanxaxheba kwiziyunguma zelizwe. The author of this drama reveals how people come to accept a priest when they decide to enter the denomination.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ubusuku Basentlango
Author: E.M. Mbobo

Description: Ukubulawa ngokumasikizi kwabantu bengenatyala ngobugqwirha yinkohlakalo yomntu komnye. UKhwane, igorha, lasindisa ubomi ukuze lincedise ikumkani yalo eluhlaselweni. Zizenzo zoxolo ezingundoqo kwinkokeli yenyani. The tragic killing of innocent people accused of witchcraft, is a historical reminder of man’s inhumanity to man. Khwane, a brave leader and a peaceful man, saved many lives under these unhappy circumstances.
Subtitle: null
Title: Umkhonto KaTshiwo
Author: A.P. Ngani

Description: Drama
Subtitle: null
Title: Zikhethele (MML Literature Series)
Author: Fundiswa Lovedalia Bangani

Description: Tomas and Anneke are tourists who come to stay at Makhulu's Bed and Breakfast. They are really enjoying their stay until Thomas loses his wallet! Where could it have gone? They search everywhere for it… Lindiwe wants to help but everyone says she's too young and she'll just get in the way. How does Lindiwe become the hero who saves the day?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Lindiwe, our hero!
Author: Michele Schwartz

Description: Uthomas no-Anneke bavakatjhi ebafika bahlale endaweni Makhulu's Bed and Breakfast. Bahlezi kamnandi kufikela ngesikhathi uThomas alahla isikhwama sakhe semali! Ngabe syephi? Basifuna indawo yoke…Ulindiwe ufuna ukurhelebha kodwana woke umunthu uthi usese mncani khulu,uzobaphazamisa kwaphela. Kukghonakala njani bona uLindiwe abe liqhawe elibakhupha ekingeni.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ulindiwe, Iqhawe lethu!
Author: Michele Schwartz

Description: Tomas le Anneke ke baeti ba tlilego dula ga Makhulu'S Bed and Breakfast. B ipsina ka leeto la bona go fihlela ge Tomas a lahlegelwa ke sekhwama! E ka ba se ile kae? Ba lebeletše gohle….Lindiwe o nyaka go thuša eupša bohle ba re ke o monnyane gomme o tla ba šitiša fela. lindiwe o ba bjang mogale yoo a hlakkodišiage letšatši?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Lindiwe, mogale wa rena!
Author: Michele Schwartz

Description: Tomas le Annake ke bahahlaudi ba tlileng ha Makulu. Ba natesfetswe ke ho dula Makhulu's Bed and Breakfast,ho fihlela Tomas a lahlehelwa ke mokotlana wa hae wa tjhelte! Ekaba mokkotlana o felestse kae? Ba o batla hohle …Lindiwe o batla ho thusa,empa bohle ba re o sa le monnyane mme o tla ba sitisa ho batlisisa. Ebe Lindiwe o fetoha mohale ya thusitseng  bohle,jwang?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Lindiwe, mohale wa rona!
Author: Michelle Schwartz

Description: Tomas Le Anneke ke bajanala ba ba tlang go nna kwa Makhulu's Bed And Breakfast. Ba itumelela that go nna ga bona kwa teng go fitlhela Tomas a latlhegelwa ke walete ya gagwe! E ka bo e ne e ile kae? Ba  e batlea gotlhe...Lindiwe o batla go thusa mme batho botlhe ba re o monnye thata mme o tla ba kgoreltsa fela. Go tlka jang gore Lindiwe e nne mogaka yo o bolokang letsatsi?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Lindiwe, mogaka wa rona!
Author: Michelle Schwartz

Description: Tomas na-Anneke bavakashi labete kutawuhlala kuMakhulu's Bed and Breakfast. Bakujabulela kakhulu kuhlala kwabo kwaze kwaba ngulesikhatsi Tomas alahlekelwa sipatji sakhe! Kungabe sishonephi? Baphenya yonkhe indzawo basifuna … Lindiwe abefuna kubasita kodvwa wonkhe umuntfu abelibele kutsi mncane kakhulu utabe alibele kubagila. Kwenteka njani kutsi Lindiwe abe lichawe lelalalmula ngalelo langa?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Lindiwe, lichawe letfu!
Author: Michelle Schwartz

Description: Tomas na Annele ndi vhaendelamashango vho ḓaho u dzula fhethu hune ha pfi Makhulu's Bed & Breakfast. Vho vha vha tshi khou dšiphina nga u dzula havho u swikela Tomas a tshi xedza waḽethe yawe! I nga vha yo ya ngafhi? Vha guduba hoṱhe … Lindiwe u khou ṱoda̭ u thusa  fhedzi muṅwe na muṅwe u khou sokou dzulela u mu vhudza zwauri u muṱukusa nahone u ḓo vha thivhela nḓila. Lindiw u vha hani muhali o tsireledzaho ḓuvha?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Lindiwe, muhali wanga!
Author: Michelle Schwartz

Description: UTomas no-Anneke ngabakhenkethi abeze kuhlala kwaMakhulu's Bed and Breakfast. Bakonwabele kakhulu ukuhlala apha de uThomas walahla isipaji sakhe! Ingaba siyephi bethu? Basifuna kuyo yonke indawo … uLindiwe ufuna ukubancedisa kodwa wonke umntu uthi usemnicane kakhulu uza kubabhidisa nje kuphela. Ingaba uLindiwe ufuna ukubancedisa kodwa wonke umntu uthi usemncinane kakhulu uza kubabhidisa nje kuphela. Ingaba uLindiwe uba liqhawe njani na elenze ukuba kube mnandi ngale mini?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ulindiwe, iqhawe-kazi lethu!
Author: Michelle Schwartz

Description: Tomas na Anneke i vavhaki lava va nga ta va ta tshama eka Makhulu's Bed and Breakfast. A va ri eku tiphineni ku fika laha Tomas a nga lahlekeriwa hi xipachi xa yena! Xana xi nga va xi ye kwihi? Va xi lavile hinkwako…Lindiwe u lava ku pfuna kambe munhu u'nwana na un'wana ri u ntsongo ku pfuneta naswona u ta va endlelni ya vona. Xana Lindiwe u va nhenha njhani ku pfuna?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Lindiwe, nhenha ya hina!
Author: Michelle Schwartz

Description: U-Tomas no-Anneke bayizivakshi ezifike zahlala Makhulu's Bed and Breakfast. Bayakuthokozela ngempela ukuhlala kwabo lapha kuze kufike lapho u-tomas elahla khona isihwama sakhe semali! Ngabe sishonephi? Basibheka yonke indawo … uLindiwe ufuna ukusiza kodwa wonke umuntu uthi usemncane futhi uzoma endleleni yabo. Ngabe uLindiwe ube iqhawe kanjani elisindise usuku?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ulindiwe, iqhawe lethu!
Author: Michelle Schwartz

Description: Tutu  the tortoise wants to play,run,jump and swim with her friends, so she takes off her shell and leaves it under a tree. As night falls, she looks for her shell. It's gone! Who could have taken her it? Tutu cries, but her friends gather round to help her ...\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: The Lost Shell
Author: Assamala Amoi and Benjamin Kouadio Kouakou

Description: Tutu die skilpad wil saam met haar maats speel,hardkoop,spring en swem, dus haal sy haar dop af en sit dit onder 'n boom neer. Wanner dit begin donker word,soek sy haar dop. Dit het verdwyn! Wie kon dit gevat het? Tutu huil,maar gelukkig kom al haar vriende help ...\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Die verlore dop
Author: Assamala Amoi and Benjamin Kouadio Kouakou

Description: Kgudu Tutu o batla ho bapala,ho matha,ho qhoma le ho sesa le metswalle ya hae,ka hoo o hlobola kgaketla ya hae mme o e beha tlasa sefate. Ha shwalane e tshwara o batla kgaketla ya hae. Ha e sa leyo. Ke mang ya e nkileng? Tutu o a lla,empa metswalle ya hae e mo seohela ho mo thusa...\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Kgaketla e lahlehileng
Author: Assamala Amoi and Benjamin Kouadio Kouakou

Description: Ututu olifudo ufana ukubaleka,atsibatsib,adlale,adade nabahlobo bakhe. Uthi akhulule iqokobhe lakhe alishiye phantsi komthi. Ngokuhlwa, ukhangela indawo abebeke kuyo iqokobh lakhe. Linyamalele! Ingaba lithathwe ngubani? Ututu uthi aqalise ukukhalka,se abahlobo bakhe bazame ukumnceda...\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Iqokobhe eliahlekileyo
Author: Assamala Amoi and Benjamin Kouadio Kouakou

Description: Ututu ufudu ufuna ukudlala,agijime,agxume,abhukude nabangani bakhe. Ngakho ukhumula igobolondo lakhe ulibeka ngaphansi kwesihlahla. Uma sekuhwalala,uyabuya uzofuna igobolondo lakhe. Alisekho lapho alishiye khona! Ingabe ubani olithathile? Ututu uyakhala,abangani bakhe bazama ukumsiza...\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Igobolondo elilahlekile
Author: Assamala Amoi and Benjamin Kouadio Kouakou

Description: Louba lives in a part of N'Djamena called Doumpa. Life there is not always easy,but he has his friends, his soccer and his dreams ...\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Louba the little Soccer Player
Author: Sanodji Y Abiathar and Adji Moussa

Description: Louba woon in 'n deel van N'Djamena bekend as Doumpa. Sy gesin kry swaar,maar he het sy maats,sy sokker en sy droom...\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Louba die sokkerspelertjie
Author: Sanodji Y Abiathar and Adji Moussa

Description: Louba o dula karalong e nngwe ya N'Djamela e bitswang Doumpa. Bophela ba mo ha bo bonolo ka nako tsohle,empa o na le metswalle,bolo ya hae le toro ya hae …\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Louba, sebapadi sa bolo se senyenyane
Author: Sanodji Y Abiathar and Adji Moussa

Description: Ulouba uhlala kwisiphaluka esikwidolophu yaseN'Djamena esibizwa ngokuba yiDoumpa. Ubomi kulo mmandla abusoloko bulula ngalo lonke ixesha,kodwa yena unabahlobo bakhe,ibhola yakhe yesoka unabahlobo bakhe,ibhola yakhe yesoka kwakunye nephupha lakhe ...\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ulouba, umdlali wesoka omncinane
Author: Sanodji Y Abiathar and Adji Moussa

Description: Ulouba uhlala elokishini laseN'Djamena elibizwa ngokuthi iDoumpa. Impilo lapho ayilula ngaso sonke isikhathi,kodwa unabangani,ibhola lakhe lezinyawo kanye nephupho lakhe …\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ulouba, umdlali webhola omncane
Author: Sanodji Y Abiathar and Adji Moussa

Description: E itshetlehile hodima mohale wa Afrika, Modjadji,Mofumahadi wa pula, o pheta pale ka ho fihla ha Modjadji lefatsheng la Venda le wetsweng ke komello,moo  bana ba banyenyane ba e soka ba bona pula. Se thabisang batho bohle, Modjadji o sebedisa matla a hae a makatsang ho nesa pula. Kapelenyana lefatshe le fetoha le ba letala, mme batho ba phela hantle ba ba le letha-bo hape.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Modjadji, Mofumahadi wa pula
Author: Donve

Description: Modjadj die Reenkoningin is gebaseer op die Afrika-legende en is die verhaal van die aankoms van Modjadji in die droogtegeteisterde Vendaland waar ie jong kinders nog nooit reen gesien het nie. Modajadji bebruik tot almal se vreuge haar towerkrag om reen te bring. Die land word weer groen,en die mense is weer gesond en gelukkig.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Modjadji, die reënkoningin
Author: Donve

Description: Based on African legend,Modjadji,the Rain Queen tells the story of Modjadji's arrival in drought-stricken Venda land, where the young children have never seen rain. To everyone's delight,Modjadji uses her magical powers to produce rain. Soon the land turns green, and the people of Venda land are healthy and happy again.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Modjadji, the Rain Queen
Author: Donve

Description: Oku kusekwe kwimbali yaseAfrika, Umodjadji,iKumkaniklazi yeMvula. Sibaliselwa ngokufika kukaModjadji kumhlaba waseVenda owawuthwaxwa ziimbalela nayintlupheko ngenxa yokunqaba kwemvula. Phambi kokufika kukaModajadji,abantwana baseVenda babengekaze bayibone imvula. UModjadji waswbenzia imilingo yakhe,yaza yana imvula,abantu bachulumanca kakhulu. Ngethutyana elincinane nje emva koko, waguquka umhlaba wanengca nezityalo eziluhlaza yaka,baze abantu bondleka,basempilweni kwakhona.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Umodjadji, iKumkanikazi yeMvula
Author: Donve

Description: Le ndaba yesekwe endabeni yakudala yase-Afrika egama layo lithi,Umodjadji,Indlovukazi yeMvula. Sixoxelwa ngojufika kukaModjadji ezweni laseVenda elalinesomiso esikhulu kanye nendlala ngenxa yokungani kwenvul. Ngaphambi kokufika kukaMpdajadji,abantwana baseVenda babenagakze bayibone imvula. UModjadji wasebenzisa imilingo yakhe,yase ina imvula,abantu bathokoza kakhulu. Ngesikhashana nje esifushane emva kwaloko,laguquka izwe labanotshani nezitshalo eziluhlaza cwe,abantu base bondleka,babuye baphila saka futhi.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Umodjadji, iNdlovukazi yeMvula
Author: Donve

Description: If you make fun f the others, you will suffer for it one day! That's what happened to Nana when she met the enormous caterpillar. But when the caterpillar changes into a beautiful butterfly, Nana learns that she too can change.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Nana and the Caterpillar
Author: Ousmane Diarra

Description: As jy  ander spot, sal jy eendag self daaronder ly! Dit is wat met Nana gebeur het toe sy die reuserusper teegekom het. Maar wanneer die rusper in 'n pragtige skoenlapper verander,leer Nana dat sy ook kan verander.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Nana en die rusper
Author: Ousmane Diarra

Description: Ha o etsa metlae ka batho ba bang,seo se tla o hlokofatsa ka tsatsi le leng. Ke ho etsahetseng ka Nana ha a teane le kgofu Feela ha kgofu e fethoha serurubele se setle,Nana a ithuta hoire lke yena a ka fetoha.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Nana le Seboko
Author: Ousmane Diarra

Description: Ukuba uhlekisa ngabanye,loo nto iyakukufaka enkathazweni ngenye imini! Kwaba njalo kanye apha kuNana nowathi wahlangana nombungu omkhulu ngenye imini. Kodwa wahti umbungu wakuguka,waba libhabthane,uNana waqonda ukuba naye angaguquka.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Unana nombungu
Author: Ousmane Diarra

Description: Uma wenza inhlekisa ngabanye abantu,uyose ulutheze olunenkume ngolunye usuku! Lokho kwenzeka kuNana ngesikhathi ehlangana neshongololo elikhulukazi. Kwathi uma ishongololo liphenduka liba uvemvane oluhle,uNana wafunda isifundo sokuthi naye usengaguqula isimilo sakhe.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Unana neshongololo
Author: Ousmane Diarra

Description: Once, a very old king needed a successor to his throne, so he set his people a puzzling task -  to bring him an \"oh!\" and an \"ah!\" . A clever young fellow settled in the kingdom, and he knew just where to find an \"oh!\" and an \"ah!\"\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Oh! and Ah!
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: 'n Koning wat al baie oud was,moes 'n opvolger vind en gee sy onderdane 'n moeilike opdrag - om vir hom 'n \"oe!\" en 'n \"aa!\" te bring. 'n Slim jongman kom woon in die koninkryk en weet presies waar om 'n \"oe!\" en 'n \" aa!\" te vind.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Oe! en Aa!
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: Kwake kwabakhona inkhosi leyase igugile ifuna inkhosana leyayitawusala ibusa  eishlalweni sayo sebukhosi; ngaloko yase ibekela bantfu bayo umsebenti lowawuyinkatho itsi - abayiletsele bo \"ekhu!\" na \"etjul!\" Kwatsi kulowo mnyama kwefika lomunye umfana labehlakaniphe kakhulu engcondvweni atewukhonta kulombuso walenkhosi,yena bekati kamhlope nje kutsi ngukuphi lapho kutfolakala khona bo \"ekhu!\" na etju!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ekhu! Na Etju!
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: Kgale go be go na le kgoši e nngwe e nyaka motho yoo a ka mo hlatlamago bjalo ka kgoši. O ile a fa setšhaba sa gagwe mošomo wa go makatša - gore motho yoo a ka mo tlišetšago \"oh\" le \"ah\" o tla tšea bogoši. Ka yona nako eo monna o mongwe o bohlale o ile a tla go dula nageng ya kgoši, gomme o be a tseba gabotse gore o tla hwetša \"oh\" le \"ah\" kae.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Oh! le Ah!
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: Go kile ga bo go le kgosi nngwwe e e tsofetseng thata mme a batla mojaboswa wa puso ya gagwe. Ka jalo, o ne a naya morafe wa gagwe tiro e e akabatsang tota, ya gore ba mmatlele \"oh!\" le \"ah!\" Go ne go na le lekawana lkengwe teng kwa motseng oo le le neng le itse gore le tla bona kae \"oh!\" le neng le itse gore le tla bona kae \"oh!\" le \"ah!\"\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Oh! le Ah!
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: Ka nako e nngwe,morena ya neng a tsofetse o ne a hloka mohlahlami boreneng. A nehela setjhaba sa hae selotho se thata - ho mo tlisetsa 'o!' le 'a!' Mohlankana ya bohlale a tla jaka moreneng, o ne a tseba moo a tla fumana 'o!' le 'a!' teng.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: O! le A!
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: Kwake kwabakhona inkhosi leyase igugile ifuna inkhosana leyayitawusala ibusa  eishlalweni sayo sebukhosi; ngaloko yase ibekela bantfu bayo umsebenti lowawuyinkatho itsi - abayiletsele bo \"ekhu!\" na \"etjul!\" Kwatsi kulowo mnyama kwefika lomunye umfana labehlakaniphe kakhulu engcondvweni atewukhonta kulombuso walenkhosi,yena bekati kamhlope nje kutsi ngukuphi lapho kutfolakala khona bo \"ekhu!\" na \"etju!\"\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ekhu! Na Etju!
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: Munwe musi,khosi ya kale-kale yo vha I tshi toda mulaifa,sa zwenezwo ya dzenisa vhathu khakhathini ya mutambo wa muhumbul - uri vha i disele \"oo!\" na \"ahaa!\" Munwe muswuhana wa vhutali o vha a tshi dzula shangoni la khosi yenei,nahone o vha a tshi tou divha zwavhudi-vhudi uri \"oo!\" na \"ahaa!\" zwi wanala ngafhi.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Oo! na Ahaa!
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: Khale a ku ri na hosi leyi a yi lava mudyandzhaka ya vuhosi bya yona. Kutani yi nyikile vanhu va tiko ntirhjo wo hlamarisa wo tika, hi ku va byela leswaku van'wi tisela \"oh!\" na \"ah!\" . Jaha ro tlhariha ri tshamile evukosini hikuva u switivile leswaku u ta kuma kwihi \"oh!\" na \"ah!\" kona.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Oh! na Ah!
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: Kudaladala,kwakukho ukumkani owayesele eguge kakhulu. Lo kumkani wayefuna umntu oza kugena ezihlangwini zakhe akufa,waza wanika abantu bakhe indinda yomsebenzi,ukuba bamphathele u-'awu!' no-'shu!' Kwafika indodana eyayilumke kakhulu kwelo zwe. Yona yayiyazi kakuhle indlela yokufumana u-'awu!' no-'shu!'  \r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: U-'Awu!' no-'Shu!'
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: Kwathi ngesikhathi inkosi ethize idinga indlalifa eyayi-zothatha ubukhosi uma isikhotheme,yanika abantu bayo umsebenzi owaba yindida kubona - ukuthi ba-yilethele u-'Awu!' no-'Eshu!' Umfanyana owafika uku-zokhosela kulelo zwe wavele wazi kahle uduthi anga-bathola kuphi o-'Awu!' no-'Eshu!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: U-'Awu!' no-'Eshu!'
Author: Jean Mbonyi

Description: Peggy so much wants to be special and different to all the other mice in the playground,and it takes her a while to realise how special she really is.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Peggy's Smile
Author: Kaanitah Cassim

Description: Upeggy ufuna ukuba mumuntu oqakathekileko khulu begodu ahluke nakanmakhondlwana woke endaweni yokudlala,begodu kumthatha isikhathi eside ukubona bona uqaketheke kangangani.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ukumoyizela kukaPeggy
Author: Kaanitah Cassim

Description: Peggy o fela a nyaka go ba yo bohlokwa yoo a sa swanego le magotla a mangwe kamoka lebaleng la dipapadi, gomme go mo tšea sebaka go lemoga gore o bohlokwa ga kaakang.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Go myemyela ga Peggy
Author: Kaanitah Cassim

Description: Peggy o fela a batla ho baya bohlokwa,ya sa tshwaneng le ditweba tse ding kaofela lebaleng la dipapadi,mme hona ho mo nka e seng kae ho elellwa hore o bohlokwa ho le hokae.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Lebososelo la Peggy
Author: Kaanitah Cassim

Description: Peggy o batla thata go nna a kgethegile le go farologana le magotlo a mangwe otlhe mo lebaleng la motshameko, mme go mo tsaya nakwana go lemoga gore o kgethegile go le kana kang.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Monyebo wa ga Peggy
Author: Kaanitah Cassim

Description: Peggy abenenshisekelo yekuba ngulokhesekile lenkhulu nalowehlukile kulabanye bogundvwane lababesenkhundleni yekudlala,futsi kwamtsatsa sikhatsi kutibona kuti kantsi wehluke kangaka\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Kumamatseka kwaPeggy
Author: Kaanitah Cassim

Description: Peggy u khou ṱoḓa u ḓiwana e wa vhuṱhogwa nahone o fhambana vhukuma na dziṅwe mbevha dzi re midavhini wa u tambela, nahone zwo mu dzhiela tshifhinga tshilapfu uri a zwi limuwe zwauri u wa vhuṱhogwa.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: U nwethuwa ha Peggy
Author: Kaanitah Cassim

Description: Upeggy wayefuna kangangoko ukuba ngokhethekileyo kunazo zonke ezinye iimpuku ebaleni lemidlalo,yaye kwamththa ithuba elide ukuziqonda ukuba wahluke kangakanani na kwabanye.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Uncumo lukaPeggy
Author: Kaanitah Cassim

Description: Peggy u lava ngopfu ku va loyi a hlawulekeke no hambana eka hinkwawo makondlo laman'wana eka rivala ra mintlangu,naswona swi n'wi tekela nkarhinyana ku vona laha a hlawulekeke ha kona.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: N'wayitelo wa Peggy
Author: Kaanitah Cassim

Description: Upeggy ufuna ukuba ngokhethekile nohlukile kunawo wonke amagundane enkundleni yezemidlalo, kumthatha isikhati ukubona ukuthi ngempela uhluke kangakanani.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ukumamatheka kukaPeggy
Author: Kaanitah Cassim

Description: Sithembile and Themba's mother has died and they miss her very much. But although they are sad, they come to realise that they are cared for and are not alone. Their father, their grandmother and their teacher all take care of them through each day. And often, they find that there are many special ways to remember Mommy. Remembering Mommy is a useful starting point for talking to young children about death and grief.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Remembering Mommy
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: Sithembile en Themba se ma het gesterf en hulle mis haar vreeslik. Maar hoewel hulle baie hartseer is,besef hulle dat daar na hulle omgesien word en dat hulle nie alleen is nie. Hul pa,ouma en hul onderwyser sien elkeen na hulle om deur die dag. Ook ontdek hulle gereed dat daar verskeie,spesiale maniere is war hulle aan Mammie laat dink. Ons onthou ons Mammie is 'n nuttige beginpunt om met jong kinders oor dood en hartseer te praat.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ones onthou ones Mammie
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: Umma kaSithembile noThemba wahlongakala begodu bamkhumbula khulu kwamambala. Nanyana badanile nje,bayabona bonyana bayatjhejwa begodu abasibodwa. Uyise,ugogwabo no thitjherabo bayabanakelela ngamalanga. Begoudu esikhathini esingi,bayalemuka kobana zinengi iindlela zokukhumbula uMma. U-Ukukhumbula Umma liphuzu lokuthoma lokukhuluma nabentwana ngokuhlongakala nesizi.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ukukhumbula Umma
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: Mmago Sithemble le Thema o hlokofetše,gomme ba mo hlologela kudu. Le ge ba le manyaming,ba lemoga gore ba hlokometšwe ebile ga ba nnoši. Tatago bona,koko wa bona mmogo le morutiši wa bona ba ba hlokometše ka lešṫatši. Gatšhi,ba hwetša go na le mekgwa e mmalwa ya go iketha ya go gopola Mma. Go Gopola Mma ke mathomo  a bohlokwa ge o boledišana le bana kla lehu le manyami a lona.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Go Gopola Mma
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: Mme wa Sithembile le Themba o ne a hlokahale mme ba mo hlolohellwa haholo. Empa,le ha ba hlorile ba a hlokomela hore ba a hlokomelwa mme ha ba bang. Ntaqta bona,nkgono wa bona le titjhere ya bona,bohle ba a ba hlokomela letsatsi le leng le le leng. Hangata ba fumana hore ho na le ditsela tse ngata tsa ho hoopla Mme. Ho Hlolohellwa Mme ke qalo ya bohlokwa bakeng sa ho bua le bana ba banyane ka lefu le ho tlhonamo.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ho Hlolohellwa Mme
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: Mme w ga Sithembile le Themba o tljopafetse mme ba mo tlhoafalela thata. Fela le fa ba le mo kutlobotlhokong, ba lemogile fa ba se esi ebile ba thokomelesegile. Rrabona, nkoko wa bona e morutabana wa bona, botlhe ba ba tlhokometse tsatsi le letsatsi. Go le grantsi, ba lemoga fa go na le mekgwa e le mentsi e e kgethegileng ya gopola Mme. Go Gopola Mme ke kgannyana ya botlhokwa e e ka thusang go buisana le bana ba bannye ka loso le kutlobotlhoko.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Go Gopola Mme
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: Make waSithembile na Themba washona futsi sebamkhumbula kakhulu. Noma beva buhlungu,sebacala kubona kutsi bayanakekelwa futsi abasibodvwa. Uyise wabo,gogo wabo ntahishela wabo, bonkhe babanakekela lilanga ngelilanga. Futsi njalo,batfola kutsi kunetindlela letinyenti tekukhumbula Make. Kukhumbula Make kuyindlela lekahle yekucala kukhuluma kubantfwana labancane mayelana nekufa nelusizi.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Kukhumbula Make
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: Mme a Sithembile na Themba vho lovha,nahone vha vha humbula ngamaanḓa. Naho vho dinalela,vha swika hune vha hi zwi humbula zwauri vha a ṱhogomeliwa nahone a vha vhoṱhe. Khotsi avho,makhulu wavho,na mudededzi wavho vha vha ṱhogomela ḓuvha ḽinwe na ḽinwe. Kanzhi vha wana uri hu na nḓila nnzhi dza u elelwa Mme. U Humbula Mme ndi nḓila  ya mathomo ya u amba na vhana nga ha vhuṱungu na lufu.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: U Humbula Mme
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: Umama ka Sithembile noThemba wasweleka ngoku bamkhumbula kakhulu. Nangona bekhangelaka lusizi baye baziqonda ukuba bakhathalelwe kwaye ababodwa. Utata wabo, umakhulu notitshala wabo babebakhathalela yonke imihla. Ngenxa yale mizamo baye bakuqonda ukuba zininzi iindlela abanokukkhumbula ngazo umama wabo. Iinkumbulo Ngomama sisikhokelo esilulutho esinokusetyenziswa xa ufuna abantwana baqhelane nentlunu yokufa.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Iinkumbulo Ngomama
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: Manana wa Sithembile na Themba u lovile naswona va n'wi kayivela swinene. Hambileswi va twaka ku vava,va sungula ku swi vona leswaku va hlayisekil naswona a va voxe. Tata wa vona,kokwana wa vona na mudyondzisi wa vona va va hlayisa siku na siku. Naswona va swi tiva leswaku ku a tindlela to tala ta nkoka to tsundzuka Manana. Ku Tsundzuka Manana i ndlela yo sungula ya ku vulavula na vana lavantsongo mayelana na rifu na ku twa ku vava.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ku Tsundzuka Manana
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: Umama ka Sithembile noThemba ushonile futhi bayamkhumbula kakhulu. Yise bedangele,bayabona ukuthi bayanakekelwa futhi ababodwa. Ubaba wabo,ugogo wabo kanye ntohisha wabo bayabanekekela usuku nosuku. Futhi ngokujwayelekile,bayathola ukuthi ziningi izindlela ezikhethekile zokukhumbula uMama. Inkumbulo Ngomama indawo yokuqala ebalulekile yokukhuluma nezingane ezincane ngokufa kanye nosizi.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Inkumbulo Ngomama
Author: Carol Bloch,Boyce B Mgcina,Refeekah Patel, Juliana Seleti & Ethel Sithole

Description: What do you do when a big,scary stranger follows your every move? Where do you hide? Can you ever really get away from the frightening giant?
Subtitle: null
Title: Shadow, The
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: Wat maak 'n mens as 'n groot yslike vreemdeling jou bangmaak omdat hy alles wat jy doen, dophou? Waar kruip 'n mens weg? Kan jy ooit regtig van hierdie skrikwekkende reus vlug?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Die Skaduwee
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: Wenzani lokha umyeni omkhulu othusako akulandela soke siskhathi? Ubhaca kuphi? Ungasibalekela isinadlheso na?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Umthunzi
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: O ka dira eng ge motho wa senatla, yoo a boifišago, o sa mo tšebego a ka go sala morago? O ka iphihla kae? Naa o ka tla wa tshabela ledimogadi leo le tšhosago?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Seriti
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: O ka etsang ha motho ya tshabehang eo o sa mo tsebeng a o sala morao? O ka ipata hokae? Na o ka hla wa balehela ledimohadi leo le tshosang?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Seriti
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: O dira eng fa mtho yo o sa mo itseng, wa mokaloba,e bile a tshosa, a sala morago motsamao mongwe le mongwe wa gago? O iphitlha  kae? A tota o ka tshabela kwa kgakala le mokaloba yo o tshosang yo?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Moriti
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: Wenta njani nawulandzxelwa yintfo lekhulu leyesabekako konkhe lapo uyakhana? Ubhacaphi? Ungakhona yin vele kuisbalekele lesidlakela lesesabeka kangaka?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Sitfunti
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: Ni nga ita a mini musi arali muthu wa mutsinḓa muhulu-hulu nahone a shushaho a tshi khou ni sala murahu huṅwe na huṅwe? Ni nga vhuya na kona u shavha ḽivhanda ḽi ofhisaho zwa vhukuma \r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Murunzi
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: U endla yini loko munhu lonkulu u nga n'wi tiviki a ku landzelela kun'wana na kun'wana laha u yaka kona? U tumbela kwihi? Xana u nga siya xihontlovila lexo chavisa?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ndzhuti
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: Wenzani xa kukho umntu owoyikekayo ongamaziyo ekulandelayo. Akulandele kuyo yonke indawo oya kuyo? Uzimela phi? Ingaba ungakwazi ukubaleka usishiye isgebenga esoyikekayo?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Isithunzi
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: Wenzenjani uma umntu ongamazi omkhulu nowesabekayo ekulandela yonke indawo? Ucashaphi? Ungakwazi ngempela ukumbalekela umuntu owesabekayo nomkhulu kangako?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Isithunzi
Author: Thembinkosi Kohli

Description: A troop of colourful stars once ruled a corner of the sky. They thought they were better than the white stars and boasted loudly all night. Finally, the white stars could stand it no longer. What happened when the colourful stars were forced to leave the sky and land on earth's dry, dusty sand?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Stars on the Dunes
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Eendag was daar 'n klomp helderkleurige sterre wat baas gespeel het oor 'n gedeelte van die hemelruim. Hulle het gedink dat hulle beter is as die wit sterre en het snags luidekeels gespog. Die wit sterre kon dit uiteindelik nie meer verduur nie. War het met die kleurvolle sterre gebeur toe hulle gedwing is om die hemelruim te verlaat en hulle op die droë sand op aarde geval het?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Sterre op die Duine
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Umhlambi weenkwekwezi ezimibalabala zakhe zabusa ihugu yesibhakabhaka. Zona zazidlumbaba bona zingcono kuneekwekwezi ezimhlope gade zizibetha isifuba zikhulmela phezulu ngalokho. Emaswapheleni, iinkwekwezi ezimhlope azange zisakghona ukugodlhelela. Kwenzekani lokha iinkwekwezi ezimbalabala zikatelwa ukutjhiya isibhakabhaka zawela esandeni eyomileko Ephasini?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Iinkwekwezi Eendundumeni
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Seboka sa dinaledi tša mebalabala di ile tša buša sekhutlwana sa legodimo. Di be di ngana gore di kaone go feta dinaledi tše tšhweu,gomme di dula du ikgantšha bošego ka moka. Mafelelong, dinaledi tšela tšatshweu tša se sa kgona go kgotlelela. Naa go ile gwa direga eng ge dinaledi tša mebalabala di rakwe legodimong,di wela Lefaseng,mohlabeng wo o omilego?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Dinaledi mo Mebotong
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Sehlopa sa dinaledi tse mmala di kile tsa abusa sekgutlwana sa lehodimo. Di ne de nahana hore di betere ho feta dinaledi tse tshweu mme di ithorisa ka matla bosiu bohle. Qetellong dinaledi tse tshweu tsa se kgone ho mamella. Ho etsahetse eng ha dinaledi tse mmala i ne di qobellwa ho tlhoha lehodimong mme tsa wela lehlabatheng le leroleng le ommeng la lefatshe?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Dinaledi hodimo ha totoma
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Losagaripa Iwa dinaledi tsa mebalabala lo kile lwa bo le busa sekhutlo sa loapi. Di ne di itlhoma fa di le bokota mo dinaleding tse ditshweu mme di ikgantsha le go tIhodia bosigo botlhe. Ga fitlha nako e ka yona dinaledi tse ditsweu di sa tlholeng di na le kgoetlelelo. Go diragetse eng fa dinaledi tsa mebalabala di ne di patelediwa go tswa mo loaping mme di wela mo motlhabeng o o omileng wa Lefatshe?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Dinaledi mo mebotwaneng
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Licembu lelikhulu letinkhanyeti letimibalabala lake labusa linye likhona lesibhakahaka. Taticabanga kutsi tincono kunetinkhanyeti letimhlope,futsi titigabatisa timemeta bonkhe busuku. Ekugcineni,tinkhanyeti letimhlophe tabona kutsi tingeke tisakumela loko. Kwentekani tinkhanyeti letimibalabala tiphocelelwa tisuke esibhakabhakeni tiyewutseleka phansi esihlabatsini lesomile saseMhlabeni.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Tinkkhanyeti endvundvumeni yesihlabatsi
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Hu na tshifhinga tshe tshigwada tsha naledzi dza mivhala dza vhuya dza vhusa inwe kuda ya lutombo. Dzo vha dzi tshi humbula zwauri dzi khwine kha naledzi tshena nahone dza dikukumusa lwa phosho vhusikui hothe. Mafhedziseloni,naledzi tshena dza sa tsha zwi kondelela. Ho bevelela mini musi paledzi dza tshi kombetshedsea u tutshela lutombo dza swika mutavhani wo omaho wa Lifhasi?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Naledzi Ndundumani dza Mutavha
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Iqela leenkwenkwezi ezimibalabala laliphethe icala lonke lesibhakabhaka. Zazicinga ukuba zingcono kuneenkwenkwezi ezimhlophe kwaye zazidlisela ngoko ubusuku bonke. Ekugqibeleni iinkwenkwezi ezimhlope zadikwa yeyokosa. Kwenzeka ntoni mini iinkwekwezi ezimibalabala zanyanzelwa ukuba zisisihiye isibhakabhaka zize kutsho kwintlabathi engumqwebedu eqhumayo yasemhlabeni?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Iinkwenkwezi ezikwiingquzu zentlabathi
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Ntlawa wa tinyeleti ta mihlovohlovo ti tshama ti fuma eka khona yin'wana ya tilo. A ti anakanya leswaku ti antswa ku tlula tinyeleti leti to basa ti tlhea ti tinyungubyisa ti ri karhi ti ba huwa ni vusiku. Eku heteleleni, tinyeleti leti to basa a ta ha swi kotanga kuva ti swi tiyisela. Ku humelele yini loko tinyeleti ta mihlovohlovo ti bohekile ku suka etilweni ti wela emisaveni ya sava lero oma?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Tinyeleti ehenhla ka tintshava ta sava
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Ibutho lezinkanyezi ezinemibalabala lake labusa uhlangothi oluthile lwesibhakabhaka. Lezi zinkanyezi zazizibona zingcono kunezinye izikanyesi ezazinombala omhlope kuphela,zihlala zizgcona njalo ebusuku. Ekugcineni, izikanyezi ezinombala omhlope zacasuka. Kwenzekani ngesikhathi izinkanyezi ezinemibalabala zixoshwa esibhakabhakeni,zizthola sezisesihlabathini esomile nesinothuli lapha phansi emhlabeni?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Izinkanyezi ezisezidulini
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Vuyo is a little South African boy who loves to play! Young children everywhere will enjoy the simple text and delightfully detailed illustrations, which describe the things he enjoys playing with - and how he loves playing with other children most of all.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Vuyo's Day
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: Vuyo is 'n klein Suid-Afrikaanse seuntjie wat baie graag speel! Die eenvoudige teks en besonderse illustrasies sal tot almal spreek. Kinders van oraloor sal dit geniet om te lees van al die dinge warmee Vuyo graag speel - en dat hy dit die meeste geniet om met ander kinders te speel!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Vuyo se dag
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: Uvuyo musanyana omcane weSewula Afrika othanda ukudlala! Abentwana abancani kiyo yoke indawo bazokuthabela umtlolo olula lo begodu nemigwalo ethabisako ekhombisa izinto athanda ukudlala ngazo -  begodu ukudlula koke bona uthanda njani ukudlala nabanye abentwana!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ilanga likaVuyo
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: Vuyo ke mosimane o monnyane wa Afrika Borwa Yo a ratago go raloka! Bana ba lefase le ka bophara ba tla rata sengwalwa se ka gore se ngwadilwe  ka mokgwa o bonolo, e bile go na le diswantsho tsa go kgahlisa tseo di hlalsago dilo  tseo di hlalosago dilo tseo banan ba ratago go raloka ka tsona le k mokgwa o ba ratago go raloka le bana ba bangwe ka gona!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Letsatsi la Vuyo
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: Vuyo ke moshanyana wa mo Afrik-Borwa ya ratang papadi haholo! Bana ba banyenyane hohle ba tla thabela sengolwa se balehang le ho utlwisiseha ha bobe mme se tshwatshitswe le ho hlaloswa ka tshwanelo ka dintho tseo ba thabelang ho bapala ka tsona, le ka moo ba ratang ho bapala lee bana ba bang.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Letsatsi la Vuyo
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: Vuyo ke mosimanyana wa Aforika Borwa yo a ratang go tshameka! Bana botlhe ba tl itumelela kgang e e bonolole ditshwantsho tse dintle tse di dirisitsweng go tlhalosa dilo tse a itumelelang go tsahameka ka tsona -  godimo ga moo, le gore o itumelela jang go tshameka le bana ba bangwe!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: letsatsi la ga Vuyo
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: Vuyo ngaumfganyana waseNingisimu Afrika lotssandzako kudlala! Abantwana labancane kuto tonkhe tindzawo batayitsakasela lendwajan llula nalenetitfombe letidvwerjwe kahle, lechaza kahle tonkhe tintfo latsandza kudlala ngato - nekutsi futsi utsandza kangakanani kudlala nalabanye bantfwana kwengca kenkhe! \r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Lilanga laVuyo
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: Vuyo ndi mutukana mutuku wa Afurika Tshipembe ane a funa u tamba! Vhana vhatuku hunwe na hunwe vha do diphina nga kubugwana ukwu kune,kwa talutshedza zwithu zwine a diphina ngazwo musi a tshi khou tamba nazwo - na uri u funa u tamba na vhanwe vhana zwine zwa tou vha zwihulu-hulu!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ḓuvha ḽa Vuyo
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: UVuyo yinkwenkwana encinane yaseMzantsi Afrika ekuthanda kuene ukudlala! Abantwana abancinane kulo lonke elimiweyo baya kuwowabela amaganyana ambalwa nemifanekiso emihle necacileyo, echaza izinto athanda ukudlala ngazo - indlela athanda ngayo ukulala nabanye abantwana!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Imini kaVuyo
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: Vuyo I mufana lontsongo wa Afrika Dzonga loyi a tsakelaka ku tlanga! Vafana lavantsongo kwihi na kwihi laha va nga  kona va ta tiphina hi atsalwa lero olova ri tlhela ri ri na swifaniso leswo tsakisa leswi nga na vuxokoxoko lebyi hlamuselaka swilo leswi a tiphinaka hi swona loko a tlanga hi swona - na leswi a tsakelaka ngopfu ku tlanga na vana van'wana eka hinkwaswo!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Siku ra Vuyo
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: UVuyo ngumfana omncane waseNingizimu Afrika othanda ukudlala! Izingane ezincane yonke indawo ziyokujabulela ukufunda incwadi elula nenezithombe ezijabulisayo echaza izinto akathanda ukudlala ngazo - nokuthi ngaphezu kwakho konke ukuthanda kangakanani ukudlala nezinye izingane!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Usuku lukaVuyo
Author: Carol Bloch

Description: Wha do I hear? What do I Smell? What do I taste? What do I love to touch? This book provides a fun-filled and entertaining look at the world around us. Young readers enjoy its humour.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: What Do I See that Flies?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Wat hoor ek? Wat ruik ek? Wat proe ek? Waaraan raak ek graag? 'n Heeltemal ander blik op die wereld om ons vir jong lesers.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Wat sien ek wat vlieg?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Ngizwa ini? Nginukelela ini? Nginambitha ini? Ngithanda ukukgwatha ini? Ukuqala iphasi lethu ngendlela ehlukileko,ukwenzela abafundi abasebancani.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Yine engiyibonako ephaphako?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Ke kwa eng? Ke kwa monkgo wa eng? Ke latswa eng? Ke rata go kgoma eng? Tsela yeo e fapanego ya go lebelela lefase la rena,bakeng sa babadi ba rena ba bomapimpane.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ke bona eng yeo e fofago?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Ke utlwa eng? Ke utlwa monko wa eng? Ke latswa eng? Ke rata ho thetsa eng? Tsela e fapaneng ya ho sheba lefatshe la rona, bakeng sa babadi ba bannyane.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ke bona en e fofang?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Ke utlwa eng? Ke dupa eng? Ke latswa eng? Ke rata go kgoma eng? Tebo e e farologaneng tota mo lefatsheng Le le re dikologileng go babuisi ba bannye.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ke bona eng se se fofang?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Ngivani? Kunukani? Yini Lengiyinambitsako? Yini lengitsandza kuyitsintsa? Liso lelehluke khashane lemhlaba lesikuwo kubafundzi labacane.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ngibonani lendizako?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Ndi khou pfa mini? Ndi khou fembedza mini? Ndi khou pfa mini hanwaṋi? Ndi funa u kwama mini? Mbonalo yo fhambananaho vhukuma ḽifhasini ḽine ra vha khaḽo ḽa vhavhali vhaṱuku.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ndi mini zwine nda khou zwi vhona zwi fhufhaho?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Yintoni endiyivayo ngeendlebe? Yinto endiyijojayo? Ncasani endiyivayo ngomglomo? Yintoni endithanda ukuyichukumisa? Indelela eyahluke kakhulu yokujonga ihlabathi elisingqongileyo kubafundi abancinane.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Yintoni le ndiyibonayo ibhabhayo?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Ndzi twa yini? Ndzi nuheta yini? Ndzi ringa yini? Ndzi tsakela ku khumba yini? Ku languteka loko hambaneke ka misava leyi hi Rhendzeleke ya vahlayi lavantsongo.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ndzi vona yini lexi hahaka?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: Yini engiyizwayo? Yini engiyihogelayo? Yini engiyinambithayo? Yini engithanda ukuyithinta? Ukubheka umhlaba osizungezile ngokwehluke kakhulu kubafundi bezincwadi abasebancane.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Yini engiyibonayo endizayo?
Author: Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: This little boy wants to grow up really fast. He tells us why he wants to be a grown up, and what he plans to do make the world a better place.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: When I Grow Up
Author: Cyprien K.M. Akuete

Description: Hierdie seuntjie wil baie gou groot word. Hy vertel vir ons hoekom hy 'n grootmens wil wees, en wat hy wil doen om die wêreld 'n beter plek te maak.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Wanneer ek groot is
Author: Cyprien K.M. Akuete

Description: Moshanyana enwa e monyenyane o batla ho hola ka potlako. O re bolella hore hobaneng a batla ho ba moholo,mme seo a batlang ho se etsa se lokisa maemo a lefatshe.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ha ke hola
Author: Cyprien K.M. Akuete

Description: Lo mfana ufuna ukukhula ngokushesha okukhulu. Sitshelwa ngezizathu ezimenza ukuthi afune ukukhula ngokushesha, kanye nezinto ahlose ukuzenza ukuze enze umhlaba ube yindawo engcono yokuphila.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Uma ngikhula
Author: Cyprien K.M. Akuete

Description: Le nkwenkwana ifuna ukukhula ngokukhawuleza okukhulu. Isixelela ngezizathu ezibangela ukuba ifune ukukhula ngokukhawuleza,kwanezinto eceba ukuzenza ukuze yenze ihlabathi libe yindawo yokuhulala engcono.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Ndakukhula
Author: Cyprien K.M. Akuete

Description: Why isn't Titi in the photographs in the family photo album? He really wants to know. I f he wasn't born yet, then where was he? Titi asks many questions to help him solve this mystery.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Why Aren't I in the Photographs?
Author: Kidi Bebey

Description: Hoekom is Titi nie op die foto's in sy gesin se foto-album nie? Hy wil baie graag weet. As hy nog nie gebore was nie,war was hy? Titi vra baie vrae om hom te help om hierdie raaisel op te los.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Hoekom is ek nie op die foto's nie?
Author: Kidi Bebey

Description: Hobaneng ha Titi a le siyo ditshwantshong tse albamong ya lelapa? O batla ho tseba a tiile. Haeba a ne eso tswalwe,ebe jwale o ne a le kae? Titi o botsa dipostso tse ngata tse tla mo thusa ho rarolla mohlolo ona wa taba.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Hobaneng ha nna ke le siyo ditshwantshoang?
Author: Kidi Bebey

Description: Kutheni uTiti engejkho emifanekisweni ekwincwadi yeefoto zosapho? Uyafuna ngenene ukwasi isizathu. Ukuba wayengekazalwa ngelo xesha ingaba wayephi? UTiti ubuza intlaninge yemibuzo ezama ukusombululula esi sishiqi.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Kutheni ndingekho emfanekisweni nje?
Author: Kidi Bebey

Description: Kungani uTiti engekho ezithombeni ezisebhukwini lezithombe lomndeni. Ngempela ufuna ukwazi. Uma Kungukuthi wayengakazalwa ngaleso sikhathi,wayekuphi-ke? Utiti ubuza imibuzo eminingi ukuze axazulule le nkinga.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Kungani mina ngingekho ezithombeni?
Author: Kidi Bebey

Description: Peter o ile a ba le ditoro tša go ba naledi ya kgwele ya maoto. Eupša o b a tla ba yona bjang a be a se na le dieta tša kgwele ya maoto? Ka moo Peter a dria tumelano le tatagwe. Naa Peter o tla kgona go hwetša dieta tša gagwe tša kgwele ya maoto?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Laduma!
Author: Nompumelelo Zama

Description: Peter o ile a ba le ditoro tsa ho ba naledi ya bolo ya maoto. Empa o ne a tla ba yona jwang a ne a se na le dieta tsa abolo? Kahoo Peter a etsa tumelano le ntatae. Na ebe Peter o tla kgona ho fumana dieta tsa har tsa bolo?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Laduma!
Author: Nompumelelo Zama

Description: Peter o ne a lora go nna naledi ya kgwele ya dinao ka letsatsi lengwe. Fela o ne a tla kgona jang fa a ne a sena dikhokho tsa kgwele ya dinao? Kjalo Peter o ne a dira tumalano le rraagwe. A Peter o ne a dira tumalano le rraagwe. A Peter o tla kgona go nna le dikhokho?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Laduma!
Author: Nompumelelo Zama

Description: Peter abephupha aba ngumdlali lomkhulu webhola yetinyawo. Kodwa loko kwakungenteka kanjani ate nemakhokho ebhola nje? Ngako Peter wenta sivumelwano neyise. Angakhona yini Peer kuwasebentela lamakhokho akhe?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Laduma!
Author: Nompumelelo Zama

Description: Peter o vha e na muḽoro wa u vha ngweṋa ya boḽa. Fhedzi izwo o vha a tshi ḓo zwi konisa hani ngeno a si na na mabutswu a boḽa? Sa zwenezwo Peter a ita thendelano na khotsi awe. Peter u ḓo kona u wana mabutswu awe?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Laduma!
Author: Nompumelelo Zama

Description: Peter u lorhile a ri nyeleti ya xitlangi xa bolo. Kambe a ta swi kotisa ku yini loko a ri hava mabuntsu yo raha bolo? Kutani Peter a endla xiboho na tata wa yena. Xana Peter u ta swi kota ku kuma mbabuntsu ya yena?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Laduma!
Author: Nompumelelo Zama

Description: Upeter waphupha ngokuba umpetha webhola lezinyawo. Kodwa wayengaba kanjani umpetha uma wayengenawo ngisho amakhokho? Ngakho-ke uPeter wenza isivumelwano nobaba wakhe. Uzokwazi u Peter ukuwasebenzxela amakhokho akhe?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Laduma!
Author: Nompumelelo Zama

Description: Diphoofolo' is the Sotho word for animals. Diphoofolo is a multilingual collection of animal rhymes from South Africa - the frog, pig, hawk, butterfly, hare, spider and ostrich will delight young children.\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: Diphoofolo:  Mutlilingual Rhyme Book
Author: Illustrations by Reviva Schermbrucker

Description: \"What does 'twins' mean? Does it have anything to do with mince? Maybe with beans? Or a prince? What does 'twins' mean?\r\n\r\nGo further into the wonderful world of twins and discover why each twin is special and unique.
Subtitle: null
Title: Twins
Author: Matina Genkova-Mpofu

Description: Imbongi ibonga ngeendidi ngeendidi zezibongo ngeenjongo zayo zokuyala nokufundisa uluntu nesizwe siphela. Nazi izibongo abonga ngazo: Ixesha; Imfundo; Indaba yotyelo nezinye. Izibongo ezingendalo zezinye ezigqame kakhulu kuye. Imbongi isebenzise ulwimi olwamkelekileyo nezangotshe ezibonisa imifanekiso ntelekelelo. The poet explores different aspects of our lives. He praises nature and good values amongst other social issues. The poetry style is simple and figurative.
Subtitle: null
Title: Izapholo
Author: M.G. Bici

Description: Apha imbongi igxile kwimiba edla umzi. Ibonga iyala ikwakhuthaza. Ibonga ngeempawu zentsulungekho ekufuneka zinanziwe ngabantu ezinjengezi: Ubuntu; Ikamva; Isiluleko; ubomi; Vuka ubophelele. Zikho nezinye izibongo ezingendalo ezizezi. Isakhono sobugcisa nokuchonga amagama siphuhlisa uvakalelo kunye nemifanekiso ntekelelo kumbongo ngamnye. The poet explores different aspects of our lives. These include values, ubuntu, the origin of music amongst many others. The language and style is poetical.
Subtitle: null
Title: Izithebe
Author: S.E. Landau

Description: Imbongi ibonga ngeendidi zezibongo ngenjongo yokululeka nokwakha isizwe. Yive xa ibonga ngale miba ilandelayo; Iflegi yesizwe; Ikhaya elililo; Impumelelo; Umfundisi ntsapho; imfundo njl. – njl. Zikho nezo ziqulathe imbali yesizwe sakwaNtu enjongo yazo ikukubonisa umzila ohanjwe lusapho lukaNtu. The poet praises different aspects of life whilst focussing on educating the reader. The language style is poetic and stimulating.
Subtitle: null
Title: Izithonga Zenkanunu
Author: S.E. Landau

Description: Le yincwadi yemihobe esizobela iliso elibukhali lombhali kwindlela abahlala ngayo abantu. Ukanti ke usidandalazile nesakhono sakhe esinomahluko kwisimo sakhe sokubhala. Ubugcisa bokuzoba imifanekiso - ngqondweni siyabubona ngokucacileyo apha kule ngqokelela yemihobe nezibongo. An enjoyable poetry collection that comments on human behaviour. The poet draws the reader in with his vivid imagination.
Subtitle: null
Title: Aweselwa 1
Author: Nombuso Mtintsilana, et al

Description: Le yincwadi yemihobe esizobela iliso elibukhali lombhali kwindlela abahlala ngayo abantu nobuhle bezinto zendalo. Ukanti ke usidandalazile nesakhono sakhe esinomahluko kwisimo sakhe sokubhala. Ubugcisa bokuzoba imifanekiso – ngqondweni siyabubona ngokucacileyo apha kule ngqokelela yemihobe nezibongo. An enjoyable poetry collection that comments on human behaviour. The poet draws the reader in with his vivid imagination. It also includes a useful guide for learners at the back of the book.
Subtitle: null
Title: Aweselwa 2
Author: N. Mtintsilana, M. Sirayi, et al

Description: Le yincwadi yemihobe esizobela iliso elibukhali lo mbhali kwindlela abahlala ngayo abantu nobuhle bezinto zendalo. Ukanti ke usidandalazile nesakhono sakhe esinomahluko kwisimo sakhe sokubhala. Ubugcisa bokuzoba imifanekiso – ngqondweni siyabubona ngokucacileyo apha kule ngqokelela yemihobe nezibongo. An enjoyable poetry collection that comments on human behaviour. The poet has the draws reader in with his vivid imagination.
Subtitle: null
Title: Aweselwa 3
Author: W.M. Kwetana, et al

Description: Kule ncwadi umbhali afundisa ukubaluleka kokwakheka ngokwasesimilweni, ukuzinxwema kwimikhuba engalunganga nokuxabisa ukumamela ilizwi lomzali. Oku ukwenza ngokubhala iindidi zeentsomi ezingezilwanyana. Kwezi ntsomi uyayala esebenzisa ngobunono izilwanyana. Zilapha iintsomi ngoodyakalashe nomvulofo, balapha ooqashiqashi apha alola iingqongo zabafundi ngokuthi abakhuthaze ukuba bacinge ngokukhawuleza. This collection of folktales is accessible yet at the same time, educational. The language used is simple, but manages to convey to the reader a variety of characters, themes and sub-themes.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ecaleni Kweziko
Author: M.G. Mayekiso

Description: Le ncwadi yi folklore, oko kuthetha ukuba lulwazi olwasungulwa ngookhokho besizwe okanye uhlanga oluthile baza baludlulisela kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana zabo ngomlomo. Apha sithetha ngalo naluphi na ulwazi olungazange lubhalwe koko ludluliswe ngomlomo. A fascinating collection of folklore, consisting of ancient tales passed on from generation to generation, by word of mouth.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ingqaka kaMaQhudeni (Second Edition, African Heritage Series)
Author: Raymond F. Mcimeli

Description: Le ncwadi yifolklore, oko kuthetha ukuba lulwazi olwasungulwa ngookhokho besizwe okanye uhlanga oluthile baza baludlulisela kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana zabo ngomlomo. Apha sithetha ngentsomi, amaqhina, amasiko nezithethe ulwazi olungazange lubhalwe koko ludluliswe ngomlomo. Ancient tales passed on from generation to generation by word of mouth have been collected in this wonderful book of folklore.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ingqayi (African Heritage Series)
Author: L.S. Ngcangata

Description: null
Subtitle: null
Title: Inyaniso
Author: G.M. Mayekiso

Description: Imbongi ibonga ngeendidi zezibongo ngeenjongo zokwakha nokululeka isizwe. Isebenzise ulwimi oluchukumisa umxhelo noludala imifanekiso ntelekelelo kumbongo ngamnye. Nazi iindidi zezibongo azibhalileyo ngenjongo yokwaluleka isizwe: Ixesha; ibumba yamanyama; uxolo nezinye. Ubonga atyibele xa ebonga ngeMbongi yeSizwe. The poet addresses different aspects of humanity in these fascinating poems. He explores various social issues, people, values, and nature, amongst others.
Subtitle: null
Title: Khala Zome
Author: L.M.S. Ngcwabe

Description: Uncwadi lwemibongo olujonge impilo yomntu luyivelela kwintlantlo neembono zonke zobomi. An anthology of isiXhosa poetry that explores a myriad of life's diverse dimensions.
Subtitle: null
Title: Kuf’ ayayo (Creative Writing Series)
Author: G.S Galela

Description: null
Subtitle: null
Title: Masidimbaze (Creative Writing Series)
Author: Mzukwa

Description: Le yincwadi ephicotha indlela ohlalutywa ngayo umbongo. Ixhobisa umfundi ngengongoma ezibalulekileyo ekwakhiweni kombongo This book is a guide for learners on how to understand and answer poetry questions in class. With this useful guide learners will be able to master all aspects of poetry.
Subtitle: null
Title: Nambitha Isihobe 1
Author: C.K. Moropa

Description: null
Subtitle: null
Title: Okwentsatshana
Author: Lunga M. Mda

Description: Le yimisebenzi yababhali abahlanu ethe yadityaniswa ukwenza esi sisele sizele bubuncwane bothando bobomi. Le mibongo ithetha ngamaqhawe awileyo, ubuhle bendalo, umtshato, ubomi belokishi, ezopolitiko, uGawulayo nemfuneko yokuba sibe nethemba njengesizwe. An anthology of five isiXhosa poets' work. ?Their poetry focuses on a range of topics including heroes of a bygone era, the beauty of nature, marriage, politics and HIV/AIDS amongst others.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ubuncwane Besihobe (Creative Writing Series)
Author: Mqutheni

Description: Uyimbongi eneliso elibukhali nenesiphiwo esiqaqambe ngaphezu kwazo zonke iimbongi zexesha awayephila kulo. Uthetha ngezinto ezisezayo nesizibona zisenzeka kule mihla njengomzabalazo. Nyoka is one of the most talented modern poets of his time. His strength is his philosophical message embedded with high quality idiom.
Subtitle: null
Title: Uhadi (Creative Writing Series)
Author: M.E.M. Nyoka

Description: UNqakula ngumbhali wokuqala esiXhoseni ukubhala iisonethi ngempumelelo. Ukwenze oku ngolwimi olunamandla olutyibilikayo. This is an exciting collection of isiXhosa sonnets. Nqakula is the first poet in African languages to experiment successfully with this form of poetry, using expressive idiom as his major tool.
Subtitle: null
Title: Ukhanyo
Author: Charles Nqakula

Description: Le yingqokelela yemibongo apho lo ka Meme athi ajonge izinto umthi adibane nazo apha ekuphileni. Kukho imibongo engokholo, engokufa, ubuhlobo, ubuntu njalo njalo. Lo ka Meme ufaka umoya wokuzingca nokuzithanda kubantu bakuthi. An interesting anthology of isiXhosa poetry where the poet looks at the diverse lives of humanity. The poems encompass religion, death, friendship and humanity.
Subtitle: null
Title: Umnxeba Wobomi (Creative Writing Series)
Author: S.S.M. Mema

Description: Le yingqokelela yezibongo apho lo ka Mona athetha ngobomi bomntu ebujonge kwinkalo zonke. Uthetha ngemfundo, amaqhawe akwaXhosa, inkolo, abasebenzi nonxibelelwano loluntu jikelele. An anthology of isiXhosa poems where the poet looks at the diversity of the Xhosa people, how they live, communicate and socialise.
Subtitle: null
Title: Uvulindlela
Author: G.V. Mona

Description: Le ncwadi yingqokelela yemibongo ebhalwe ngulo ka Mtuze. Le mibongo ichukumisa umxhelo ngezinto - yinto zobomi ukususela kwabangasekhoyo ukuya kwabaphilayo. Le mibongo iyanambitheka ilu ncuthu mazangwa. This book is a collection of Mtuze's poems that are combined to show the best of his work. The poems explore different aspects of life that include life and death.
Subtitle: null
Title: Vingcan’ Amazibuko (Creative Writing Series)
Author: P.T. Mtuze

Description:
Uvukani Madoda Kusile luluhlu lwenqokelela eyaziwayo nethandwa kakhulu
yemibongo. Njengoko ububanzi kunye nobunzulu bolwazi ngobomi, iingcinga,
uvelwano zezona zinamandla ekuziseni ubomi babanye ababhali abaphambili
ekubhaleni imibongo yesixhosa. Ixesha langoku nelakudala lezithethe zemibongo
zibandakanyiwe, zitsho zenze ubunyani bokuxabiseka kwakemibongo eyakuthi
ibekelwe ixabiso kubafundi ezikolweni.
Vukani Madoda Kusile is a signifi cant and vibrant collection of well-known and
well-loved poems. A wide and deep range of life experiences, thoughts and
feelings are powerfully brought to life by some of the most renowned isiXhosa
poets. Both contemporary and traditional poetry are included, making this a truly
representative anthology that will be of immense value to school readers.
Subtitle: null
Title: Vukani Madoda Kusile: Izibongo Zebanga 12: Izibongo Namanqakwana
Author: Sondlo

Description: Brunette, Shelley and Samantha hit the glam life of the clubs, the fashion shoots, the offers of contracts that all exist in Maputo. Their holiday holds out the promise of great things for everyone. And then there’s\r\n... reality.
Subtitle: null
Title: A Mozambican Summer
Author: Nokuthula Mazibuko

Description:
Things are looking good for the Gruvers, but
there’s also a serious side to some parts of
young life. Mncedisi finds himself in a really heavy situation. Samantha gets
a sharp lesson and is made to take a hard look at herself. And Brunette decides on independence.
Subtitle: null
Title: Being Young
Author: Duane Jethro

Description:
The Siyagruvers have never had to handle
anything as tricky as this! What do you do
with a refugee boy who has no one to look after him and nowhere to go?
Everyone has to pull together and help
young Equiano.
Subtitle: null
Title: Boy in da City
Author: Rusleen Malbusch

Description: Rashaad is going through a tough time.\r\nHis religion, his culture, even his sexuality ...\r\nwho and what is he? Samantha and her friend Nolwazi are playing a dangerous double-game with their parents. Into their lives comes The Siyagruva Scene – and things start happening!
Subtitle: null
Title: Breaking Out
Author: Colleen Moroukian

Description:
A nationwide competition to find
some young dance idols! Who’s going to enter, who’s going to pull out,
and why? And who’s the least likely person in the Siyagruva Scene to win
it? There are surprises all along the way in this Siyagruva story.
Subtitle: null
Title: Dance Idols
Author: Anne Schlebush

Description: What’s it like coming into a well established group? Rashaad’s cousin finds out when she joins the Siyagruva Scene. Also, why is Thabiso behaving as if he wants to get out of the Scene? What’s going on?
Subtitle: null
Title: Flipside
Author: Karen Jeynes & Eeshaam September

Description:
Two pairs of Siyagruva
dancers are whisked off
to the United States– maybe to dance
in Hollywood and Washington! But there
are new experiences to be coped with first
– romance for Rashaad and Zadie, and snow for Mncedisi!
Subtitle: null
Title: Flying High
Author: Russell H Kaschula

Description:
Of course, Shelley knows better than her mother! Or does she? Tonight is
a big night for her – but it could end in disaster. Nothing gets Thabiso
down! But what happens
the night he’s not in his
wheelchair? Can his wits pull him through?
South Africa’s 100 Children’s Books,
IBBY 2004
Subtitle: null
Title: High Heels and Hijack
Author: Nibor Nalam

Description: The Siyagruvers go dancing the length and breadth of Namibia. That’s the definition of paradise, right? So why are there hassles? What’s with Mncedisi? Why’s Brunette suddenly off-centre? And what’s up with Thabiso, of all people?
Subtitle: null
Title: Namibian Kwaito
Author: Colleen Moroukian & Brion Mnala

Description: Regan fools around once too often, and lands in trouble. But he handles it, does some hard and messy work, and learns\r\na few things about discarding useless prejudices and making new friends. Meanwhile, Zadie and her family face their\r\nown crisis.
Subtitle: null
Title: Taking the Rap
Author: Ian Fritz

Description:
The police can’t solve the kidnapping cases.
They bring in crack detective Botes. Then
Shelley can’t cope at home, and gets into a tight spot. Not even Siyagruver friends can
help her. In the end, Shelley gets what she wants – or, does she?
Subtitle: null
Title: Girl Goes Missing
Author: Clive E Smith

Description:
A visiting celebrity dancer throws the
Siyagruvers into confusion! ‘What can
I wear?', ‘Will it still fit me?’ and ‘Who can
afford a new dress?’ become real questions
– what are the answers? In the meantime, love is in the air – Thabiso, Shelly, Brunette’s dad – but not always happily.
Subtitle: null
Title: Love, Chocolates & Shopping
Author: Gcinaphi Dlamini

Description: A famous Indian choreographer comes calling at the Siyagruva Scene. Three new dancers join the group, and cause some\r\nripples. Regan is forced to admit something he’s kept quiet about for a long time. Thabiso finds a soul mate. And a whole new world opens up for Raymondo.
Subtitle: null
Title: From Belhar to Bollywood
Author: Clive E Smith

Description: Unloved and unappreciated, Mum’s Cronky Car is on the verge of being scrapped and abandoned.\r\n\r\nThen one morning, on the school-run, the Cronk is living\u2028 up to his name being overtaken by a disability scooter! Then out\u2028 of nowhere he does something he’s never done before, something unbelievable. And from that moment on he’s the family favourite and their adventures are just beginning…
Subtitle: null
Title: Mum's Cronky Car
Author: Anita Pouroulis

Description:
Regile is a zama-zama working illegally in an abandoned mine near Barberton. Being eighteen, Regile has moved up the ranks and is now paid a salary to keep the other child workers in line. 

Towards the end of a three-month stint underground, a fourteen-year-old boy from Mozambique, Taiba, starts asking questions about their rescue. 

Taiba constantly reaffirms his belief that they will be saved: by the police, by the private security firms that guard the mines, or maybe even by the mythical Spike Maphosa. Regile knows that such hope is dangerous.
Subtitle: null
Title: Dreaming of Light
Author: Jayne Bauling

Description: Sandor is a great athlete, the son of a Hungarian father and a South African mother. He is good at many sports and his water polo team will soon compete in Hungary. But then his father dies on a mountain climbing outing in Cape Town. \r\n\r\nSandor is sure he saw two other men on the mountain path, but everyone else says it was an accident. Sandor starts to delve into his father’s past and when his water polo team leave for Hungary he goes in search of much more than a water polo medal . . .
Subtitle: null
Title: The Magyar Conspiracy
Author: Neil Malherbe

Description: Tom and his new puppy, Kolle, wander through colourful pages, playing in the park, meeting the occupants of a pond and a tree, investigating footprints and finally returning home to bath, bed and dreams.
Subtitle: Voelboekies vir kleuters
Title: Kollehond
Author: Ladybird

Description: A fluffy chicken introduces readers to farm animals, the sounds they make, their feeding and sleeping habits, and the work done on the farm.
Subtitle: Eerste-gunsteling Stories
Title: Kiepie Kuiken
Author: Ladybird

Description: When Joe and Katie arrive to stay on their granny’s farm during the September holidays something unexpected happens. Katie follows Morris and discovers a baby dragon. Or does she?
Subtitle: null
Title: Vumile and the Dragon
Author: Claerwen Howie

Description:
When a girl calls Brunette a ‘coconut’, the Siyagruvers suddenly notice the
differences between life in the suburbs and life in the townships or on the Cape Flats.

They have to do something about it – but what? And, hey, how come Shelley’s
mom (of all people) is riding around the townships as if it’s her turf?
Subtitle: null
Title: Mom's Taxi
Author: Mteto Mzongwana; Onele Mfeketo & Orbin Lamna

Description: Ntombazanana ithile ithi ibize uBrunette ngokuba uyi-'coconut', nto leyo ethi yneze abadanisi bakwaSiyagruva ukuba baqaphele iyantlukwano kubomi babantu abahlala ezidolophini nabo bahlala exilokishini okanye koomaCape Flats. Kufuneka benze into ngaloo nto - kodwa ke yintoni ngenene ekufanele bayenze? Tyhini! Yena umama kaShelley (kubo bonke abantu) kutheni enyuka esihla ezilokishini ngathi sisigodi sakhe nje esi?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: KHWELA-KHWELA,YIMOTO KAMAMA
Author: Meteto Mzongwana, Onele Mfeketo and Orbin Lamna

Description: Why is Zadie spending so much time riding up-front in a taxi? Should Regan keep waiting for her at the dance studio? Is this what he got out of the gangs for? What will happen when police sniffer dogs come to school?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: TROUBLES,TAXIS and TOILETS
Author: Ann Schlebusch

Description: The Siyagruvers go dancing the length and breadth of Namibia. That's the definition of paradise, right? So why are there hassles? What's with Mncedisi? Why's Brunette suddenly off-centre? And what's up with Thabiso, of all people?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: NAMIBIAN KWAITO
Author: Colleen Moroukina and Brion Mnala

Description: Usaka ekuvumbululeni izinto ezindala etiphini ukuya kuthwasela ubugqirha,ukusuka ekulahleni ithemba ukuya ekudaniseni! Oku kwenzeka kuMncedisi emva kokuba yena nomama wakhe bedfudukele edolophini. Abanye abantu bayabizwa ukuze bazalisekise inxaxheba nomsebenzi wabo ezinsatsheni zabo nasekuhleni. Wena ungaluthatha olu hambo kufanele luthathwe nguMncedisi?\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: LAJUXUZ'IGQIRHA LEMK'ETIPHINI
Author: Russell Kaschula,P Maseko and X  Guzula

Description:
In March 2000, a suitcase arrived at a children’s Holocaust education centre in Tokyo, Japan. On the outside, in white
paint were these words: Hana Brady, May 16, 1931, and Waisenkind – the German word for orphan. Children who
saw the suitcase on display were full of questions. Who was Hana Brady? What happened to her? They wanted Fumiko
Ishioka, the center’s curator, to find answers. The mystery of the suitcase takes her back 70 years, to uncover the heartbreaking story of Hana, an 11-year-old Jewish girl, whose happy life in a small Czech town was ended by the Nazi invasion. Deported to Terezin concentration camp, Hana’s life ended in the gas chamber at Auschwitz.
Subtitle: null
Title: Hana's Suitcase
Author: Karen Levine

Description: Remember, there are people affected by HIV as well as people infected by HIV. This is something Brunette and Samantha\r\nhave no reason to worry about, until they go on holiday to the home of Brunette’s mother in Soweto. Suddenly they’re living with HIV and have to learn – quick!
Subtitle: null
Title: In the Fast Lane
Author: Nokuthula Mazibuko

Description:
From the dumps to divining, from despair to
dancing! This happens to Mncedisi when he and his mother come to the city.
Some people are called to fulfil their role and
responsibility to family
and community. Could you travel the journey
Mncedisi has to?
Subtitle: null
Title: Divine Dump Dancer
Author: Russell H Kaschula

Description: ‘Buckingham Palace’ is a dingy row of five houses in the heart of District Six, a vibrant community at the foot of Table Mountain overlooking Cape Town. Richard Rive’s classic novel traces this close community through its moments of triumph and despair, its loves, its hatreds – and its bizarre\r\ncharacters. In 1966 parts of District Six were declared for white occupation only, in terms of South Africa’s notorious Group Areas Act. The inhabitants were forced to leave for the\r\nbleak wastelands of the Cape Flats. This edition incorporates teaching notes and discussion points by Robin Malan.
Subtitle: null
Title: Buckingham Palace: District Six
Author: Richard Rive

Description:
A glam god of a dance champion from overseas enters the Siyagruvers’
lives. Will some longstanding friendships
survive this? The whole idea of student exchanges comes into focus for Samantha, but she finds that her parents
have a very different idea from hers!
Subtitle: null
Title: Jacques Attack
Author: Karen Jeynes & Nkuli Sibeko

Description: Khumbula ukuba kukho abantu abathi bengenayo intsholongwane kaGawulayo,iHIV Kodwa bachaphazeleke ngeendlela ezithike,bakhona  nabachaphazeleka ngojuthi babe nayo ngqo le ntsholongwane. Ubrunette noSamantha zange bazikhathaza ngoku de baya eholideyini kumama kaBrunette eSoweto. Bazifumana,ngesaquphe,sele bephila neHIV kwaye kufuneka befundile - ngokukhawuleza!\r\n
Subtitle: null
Title: OOMASHAYELA PHEZULU
Author: N Mazibuko and X Guzula

Description: The Siyagruvers have some community work to do on the Cape Flats, and so they spend the weekend at Regan’s\r\nflat – and they find the place rocks! They’re into things they never knew\r\nhappened in their city. But ... will Shelley’s mom find out?
Subtitle: null
Title: Weekend Away
Author: Duane Jethro

Description:
Why is Zadie spending so much time riding
up-front in a taxi? Should Regan keep
waiting for her at the dance studio? Is this
what he got out of the gangs for? What will
happen when the police sniffer dogs come to
school?
Subtitle: null
Title: Troubles,Taxis and Toilets
Author: Anne Schlebusch

Description: Thabiso never talks about\r\nhis accident – can’t he face up to it? Rashaad\r\nmay be accepting what he is sexually, but what is he socially? He tries a few experiments. Regan is caught between his old gang life and the movie world!
Subtitle: null
Title: No Problem Man
Author: Biron Alnam

Description:
111 Colleen Court is the story of Farieda who grows up under Apartheid in Manenberg on the Cape Flats during the youth uprisings of 1976. Then the
untimely death of her father changes her life forever ...
111 Colleen Court is also
available in Afrikaans as Colleenhof 111.
Subtitle: null
Title: 111 Colleen Court
Author: Mohammed Ismael Davids

Description:
In I am an African, young refugees and asylum seekers tell their stories. In their own words, they recall their experiences of fleeing from war, and describe how they have managed to adapt to life in a new country. They also show that these
young people are not much different from young South Africans – they too like music, sport and having fun. I am an African is an effective resource that can be used
by and with groups of adolescents and young people and it includes activity ideas to assist facilitators in presenting the material. The stories can also be read and enjoyed as
thought-provoking and moving biographical accounts.
Subtitle: null
Title: I Am an African
Author: Joan Bloch & Sue Heese

Description: To his new friends, Ben’s life doesn’t seem so bad. But the reality is that Ben’s life is in danger, and that of his young sister.\r\nWill Ben be able to protect himself and young Lindiwe? If only he could give in to the threats and join the gang, they’d be safe.\r\nBut doing that would mean surrendering his dream. What will Ben decide, and will he ever realise his dangerous dream?
Subtitle: null
Title: The dangerous dream of Ben Maludzi
Author: Christa Laird

Description: Themba is unhappy. His beloved brother passed away, and now his mother is making him do his matric year at Harmony High, far away from his old home and friends. What’s more, his mother now spends all her time drinking, leaving Themba to make his own way. Then he meets the gorgeous Lettie and even tough guy Prince befriends him at school.
